column2: artist and author who influenced J.R.R. Tolkien

column1: * 1911 - Voice actor Michael Hordern is born.
* 1936 - J.R.R. Tolkien finishes retyping The Hobbit.
* 1963 - J.R.R. Tolkien posts Letter to Eileen Elgar (September 1963).
* 1979 - The Jackanory episode "Riddles in the Dark" is aired on the BBC.
** Gandalf arrives at Weathertop and marks a stone. At night he is attacked there by the Nazgûl. He manages to escape with four Riders behind him.
**  They see flashes from the fight at Weathertop while they leave the Midgewater Marshes.
